release.action: Create a contrib section (site & cvs) where high level components and other contributions that should not be part of the core can be put.
Move packages from com.voicetribe.* to wicket.*
Replaced the default design of a maven generated website with a more pleasing, non standard look and feel.
Added Clover logo to front page of our website.
Added support for a configurable character encoding (i18n) for markup files and HTTP response. And added a new example to show how it works.
Model for PasswordTextField will now be encrypted for persistence (cookie)
Fixed autoIndex bug. AutoIndex numbers are now unique across a whole page.
Added lots of new and improved Table features. Examples contain displaytag like demos.
signin example now includes a rememberMe functionality
Introduced new ComponentTagAttributeModifier class and associated methods as a direct replacement for HtmlTagModifier and its subclasses.
Added reset password flag for PasswordTextField in order to support input forms without emptying the contents.
Implemented support for ui messaging (also used by validation). FeedbackPanel uses this, and is more generic now as well.
Introduced ListView for lists (former Tables) that do not use paging. Table supports paging.
Fixed bug that resulted in random session timeouts.
